title: Minimalist Font ID
content:
Anyone know what font this is ?

It looks real familiar but i'm knackered and can't think straight.

[http://i32.ahpic.com/tu8agm.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023164535/http:/i32.ahpic.com/tu8agm.png "http://i32.ahpic.com/tu8agm.png")
author: E. Scrooge

comments.content:
Small image...

Helvetica or Univers condensed?
Helvetica Condensed Bold. G is a dead giveaway.
